XPathEvaluator.summary: The XPathEvaluator interface allows to compile and evaluate XPath expressions.

XPathEvaluatorCreateExpression.summary:
This method compiles an which can then be used for
(repeated) evaluations of the XPath expression.
XPathEvaluatorCreateExpression.returns:
A representing the compiled form of the XPath
expression.

XPathEvaluatorCreateNSResolver.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The createNSResolver() method of the interface used to create a custom XPathNSResolver object. It now returns the input as-is and is only kept for compatibility reasons.

XPathEvaluatorEvaluate.summary:
The evaluate() method of the interface
executes an XPath expression on the given node or document and returns an
.
XPathEvaluatorEvaluate.returns:
An object representing the result of evaluating the XPath
expression.
